# ⚠️ LIVE SOVA MVP - DO NOT EDIT DIRECTLY

**Status:** LIVE ON GITHUB PAGES
**URL:** https://jane-korn.github.io/sova-mvp/

## Critical Information

This folder contains the LIVE production assessment tool currently deployed on GitHub Pages.

### ⛔ DO NOT:
- Edit files directly in this folder
- Delete any files
- Rename files
- Move files

### ✅ TO UPDATE THE LIVE SITE:
1. Make changes in a development/test folder first
2. Test thoroughly locally
3. Only then copy to this folder
4. Commit and push to GitHub

### Deployment
All changes pushed to the GitHub repository automatically update the live site.
